title: Drugs Approved for Brain Tumors
description: This page lists cancer drugs approved by the FDA for use in brain tumors. The drug names link to NCI's Cancer Drug Information summaries. The list includes generic names and brand names.
cleaned_text: Drugs Approved for Brain Tumors This page lists cancer drugs approved by the FDA for use in brain tumors. The drug names link to NCI's Cancer Drug Information summaries. The list includes generic names and brand names. There may be drugs used in brain tumors that are not listed here. Drugs Approved for Brain
